# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/baconjs`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Bacon.js (https://baconjs.github.io/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/baconjs

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 14 Oct 2019 16:05:11 GMT
 * Dependencies: @types/jquery, @types/node
 * Global values: Bacon
